Other pages for this artwork cycle: 

=== Salmon ===

Based on Dichotomy, Salmon is a less flashy, light-colored theme. Salmon does away with purple and black, choosing instead light orange and beige.

=== Concept ===
Remain true to the "human" roots of Ubuntu, while moving forward to more up-to-date design that adheres to the concept of "light".
